SELECT `product`.`id` AS productId, `product_category`.`name` AS productCategoryName, `product`.`description` AS description, `product`.`name` AS productName, MIN(`product_ask`.`price`) AS price, `product_image`.`url` AS masterPicture FROM `product_image` JOIN `product` ON (`product_image`.`product_id` = `product`.`id`) JOIN `product_ask` ON (`product_ask`.`product_id` = `product`.`id`) JOIN `product_category` ON (`product`.`product_category_id` = `product_category`.`id`)
WHERE `product`.`id` = #{productId} AND `product_image`.is_master = 1 GROUP BY `product_ask`.`product_id`, `product_image`.`url`;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_product_favorate puf WHERE puf.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY puf.user_id
